overview: Are You Staring At Your Teacher's Tits  With a Professor as smokin' hot as Dr. Monique Alexander, it's no wonder Mick daydreams his way through every lecture. It gets even better when his classmate Madison Ivy joins the professor in double-sucking and jugg-fucking his fat cock.  You, Me, And Teacher Makes Three  When Professor Phoenix Marie finds Amber's filthy note to her husband and confronts the little slut, Amber is sure she's in big trouble. Luckily for her, Phoenix is not only fine with the idea, she wants to join in!  Rachel's Slutty Secrets  Alexis Ford and Rachel Starr sneaked out to a secret sex-spot in the school basement. In the middle of fooling around, another of Rachel's conquests burst in with a camcorder, Rachel and Alexis had no choice but spread their legs for a horny threesome.
tagline: Are You Staring At Your Teacher's Tits
